feedbacks.title: Add a dark theme option
feedbacks.description: It would help people with light sensitivities and who prefer dark mode.

comments.author: Jamas Skinner
comments.content: Second this! I do a lot of late night coding and reading...

comments.author: John Doe
comments.content: Dark theme is a must-have feature for any modern app!

feedbacks.title: Add tags for solutions
feedbacks.description: Easier to search for solutions based on a specific stack.

comments.author: Jane Smith
comments.content: This would be incredibly useful for organizing solutions!

feedbacks.title: Q&A within the challenge hubs
feedbacks.description: Challenge-specific Q&A would make for easy reference.

comments.author: Ryan Welles
comments.content: This would be really helpful for beginners.

comments.author: Emily Johnson
comments.content: I agree, this would make learning much easier!

feedbacks.title: Allow image/video upload
feedbacks.description: Images and screenshots can enhance comments on solutions.

comments.author: Michael Brown
comments.content: This would make it easier to share visual solutions!

feedbacks.title: Ability to follow others
feedbacks.description: Stay updated on comments and solutions other people post.

comments.author: Sarah Lee
comments.content: This would be great for networking with other developers!

feedbacks.title: Preview images not loading
feedbacks.description: Challenge preview images are missing when you apply a filter.

comments.author: David Wilson
comments.content: This is quite annoying, hope it gets fixed soon!

feedbacks.title: One-click portfolio generation
feedbacks.description: Add ability to create professional looking portfolio from profile.

comments.author: Laura Green
comments.content: This would save so much time for job applications!

feedbacks.title: Bookmark challenges
feedbacks.description: Be able to bookmark challenges to take later on.

comments.author: Chris Evans
comments.content: This would be very useful for organizing my learning!

feedbacks.title: Animated solution screenshots
feedbacks.description: Screenshots of solutions with animations donâ€™t display content.

comments.author: Olivia Martinez
comments.content: This is a critical issue for sharing animated solutions!

feedbacks.title: Add more filter options
feedbacks.description: Include more filter options to refine search results.

comments.author: Daniel Taylor
comments.content: More filters would definitely improve the user experience!
